definition: Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]

sentences.english: Your idea of a perfect day?
sentences.chinese: 理想中賞心稱意的一天是怎樣的？

sentences.english: Choose a design line according to your own particular preferences.
sentences.chinese: 按個人喜好選出稱意的設計系列。

sentences.english: A life without their satisfaction, get boat Ming distributed.
sentences.chinese: 人生在世不稱意，明朝散發弄扁舟。

sentences.english: This miserable weather chesses me off.
sentences.chinese: 這惱人的天氣使我感到不稱意。
